items.sentence: Once people reach a certain age, they don't want to ask their parents for help anymore.
I once read an interesting anthology of poetry generated by a computer program in 1984.
People who are afraid of making mistakes will make no progress in English conversation.
Tom doesn't have running water, so sometimes he comes over to our place to take a bath.
Tom locked himself in the bathroom, but the men who were after him broke down the door.
